snippet: Megan James and Corin Roddick, who make up a duo called Purity Ring, performed every song from their latest album, “Shrines,” at Webster Hall on Saturday.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by band Purity Ring at Webster Hall.
lead_paragraph: Megan James and Corin Roddick, who make up a duo called Purity Ring, performed every song from their latest album, “Shrines,” at Webster Hall on Saturday.

headline.main: At a Temple of Electronica, Drumming Up Lights to Carry the Rest
headline.print_headline: At a Temple of Electronica, Drumming Up Lights to Carry the Rest
